casebody.data:
991 A.2d 831 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND, Petitioner v. Erin HUTCHISON-SMITH, Respondent. Misc. Docket AG, Nos. 51, 58

Sept.Term, 2009.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. April 1, 2010.

ORDER

This matter came before the Court on the Joint Petition of the Attorney Grievance Commission of Maryland and Respondent, Erin Hutchison-Smith, Esquire, to disbar the Respondent from the practice of law.

The Court having considered this Petition, it is this 1st day of April, 2010.

ORDERED, that Respondent, Erin Hutchison-Smith, be and she is hereby disbarred from the practice of law in the State of Maryland.

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall remove the name of Erin Hutchison-Smith from the register of attorneys in the Court and certify that fact to the Client Protection Fund of the Bar of Maryland and all Clerks of all judicial tribunals in this State in accordance with Maryland Rule 16-773(d).
